exceptions.exn: Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: intros x. unfold M22scal, ZE_22. unfold prod_curry. simpl. unfold fst, snd. rewrite <- R_is_ring. repeat rewrite Rmul_0_l. repeat rewrite Rmul_0_r. repeat rewrite Rmul_0_l. repeat rewrite Rmul_0_r. rewrite M22plus_zero. reflexivity.
